author: Jonas Fredriksson
comment: Won't install on Sony SmartWatch 3 (from Oneplus 5T).

author: Liam Alexander Colman
comment: There's no better running app for android wear. Yes, the learning curve might be a bit high but once you've got it working like you want it's the best. Activities can be uploaded to Strava which in turn syncs with Google Fit. So much better than the Strava AW app with support for a whole load of sensors. Keep up the good work!

I needed an app to track my cycling and running via standalone GPS on my Sony smartwatch and in my opinion Ghost Racer is the best. I tried a few other apps, some drained the battery, in others it was difficult to choose the activity from the watch itself (needed the phone to do that). But all of this was not a problem with Ghost Racer. I love this app.

author: Mike Morley
comment: This is highly rated by some users outside of play store, so thought would look at it. Very basic as only activities are running and cycling. Also no link to Google Fit or Runtastic

author: Russ Hedger
comment: This app has been very unreliable for me. I tried it 4 times and it repeatedly stopped recording during the ride, losing ride data and restarting recording by itself.. This was while paired to a Wahoo RFLKT, which is itself barely alpha in production quality, so wouldn't surprise me if the Wahoo API is involved in this.

author: Rebecca Riley
comment: I imagine that this is fantastic, but it doesn't show on my Sony smart watch 3. Please help.  It works fantastic now it's installed! Thanks it's fab on my Sony smart watch 😃

reply.author: Brave the Skies
reply.content: Has it showed up yet? There seems to have been alot with problems over christmas, not sure if it was just more people downloading or not. But it also tied in with a rolled out update witch may have caused issues with how it installs by google play services.

author: Nicolas Rapiera
comment: Best app ever. It could use you a better design and navigation but all the features  are there. I use it to compete against other strava users time. I highly recommend the pro version. You can upload many segments from strava and offline maps. Once you start a ride, everytime you come across a segment, you get a bip alarm and a voice coach is telling you how fast you are against the original ! Only downside is sometimes it can be a ghost that is going on the opposite direction. It would be also great if we could simultaneously compete against many or all the members in the leaderboard. The app could tell what my current ranking in real time is for example.

author: Jason Taylor
comment: Fantastic. I don't get to use it much as I have a Garmin watch, but my wife loves it

author: Kenneth Speirs
comment: Most reliable tracking app to use in conjunction with Sony Smartwatch 3

author: Petr Ketner
comment: This app is awesome for running with my sw3 GPS smart watch

author: Ricky Sam
comment: Please add "max speed" to the list of variables I can add to the screen

author: simon evans
comment: Works like a dream on my Sony smart watch 3. Everything that a  wear running app/tracker should be. I first stumbled upon this app when runkeeper stopped track ing my route. I'm so glad runkeeper failed me because Ghost Racer tracks my run, provides all of the stats I need whilst on my run and then uploads the data to both runkeeper and Strava. Brilliant and best of all there are no premium subscriptions or forced pay feature's.

This app makes an awesome cycle computer. I use it on an old phone with no SIM card which is mounted in a Topeak phone case on my handlebars. It's paired with Bluetooth HRM and cadence sensors to show me how I'm doing and upload to Strava. To me it's both better and cheaper than a Garmin.

author: Leon Gierat
comment: Brilliant app. Only the hardware reliability (my wear watch GPS is a bit flaky) stopped me from using this as my main running watch.

author: nick irvine
comment: Great app on most of my devices but has accuracy trouble on my Huawei Watch 2.    Also I wish the customisable screens included Last Lap time & distance.

author: Darren McEntee
comment: Very well developed. It's what Strava's Wear app should be! Highly recommended. Some better optimisations for round screen watches is needed, plus charts and graphs would be nice future updates?...

author: Steve Slatky
comment: Simple and my go to running app. I need a 2 things in a GPS tracker, a watch app, syncing with smash run and this is the only app to do so. But it offers much more. The ghost mode is great for training agaist your time. Syncing to Strava is convenient. The ability to control what shows on the watch screen is great. I don't know what I will do when this app is no more.

author: Trenton Christopher
comment: Love the app for Android wear, you can use it without carrying your phone during the activity. The displays are customizable for what you want care about most. Uploads to smashrun. I wish it had more charting or graphing in the app though. I like it better than the other better known apps.

author: Thierry X
comment: Ghostracer ne s'installe plus sur ma Sony Smartwatch 3, s'il vous plaît faîte quelques choses!!!

author: Sutrisno Ming
comment: The best

author: Dom Gray
comment: Good app, but having recently reinstalled it it's throwing up an error when I try to link my Strava account using my Google log in - "disallowed user agent". This essentially makes the app useless unfortunately.

reply.author: Brave the Skies
reply.content: New Google sign in security.  On the Strava page click the overflow menu and click launch external browser

author: Michaela Roberts
comment: Love it but can't seem to change my route colour on the map!

author: Randall Bakken
comment: This is a must have app for my Sony smartwatch, and is way better than using the native Strava app. A+++

author: Dimas Jr
comment: A m a z I n G... Stop installing others... This is the one

author: John McRobb
comment: Must for Sony smartwatch 3

Great app that worked well for two weeks but now no longer uploads to Runkeeper - I'm just seeing "error status: 500 internal server error" for each of my runs this week. Please fix this - I was very happy with the app otherwise!

author: John Lovegrove
comment: Used on a Huawei P8 lite 2017 paired to a Sony Smartwatch 3.  Stats for a descent 8 mile run completely lost due to relying on this app to record the data. Seemed fine up to about a third in then kept resetting.

author: Farhan Z
comment: Amazing app,  my sw3 ⌚ has a new lease of life after sitting in the back of a drawer for months!  well done and keep up the great work!
Like this app for having only what's needed. Minimalistic design is a plus. Thanks!

author: Noppadol Peanpanich
comment: Cool

author: Farkas Gabor
comment: History graph doesn't show heart rate data. That's the thing I'm mostly interested in when I use an app like this. Endomondo has that function, but I hate that app. I was so happy when I thought I finally found a better one. But without that function this app is useless to me. 😑

author: Mike Arndt
comment: I installed this app primarily for the AndroidWear 2.0 integration which I'm finding is too buggy for regular use (I have the Moto 360 Sport 2) I wanted something that would work in standalone but the standalone abilities are unreliable. After sending a lot of time setting up Ghosts, syncing to my watch and even testing it to make sure it worked it still failed me when I went on my first run. I have hope for this app and hope the developers know that and won't give up on a true standalone running experience on AW2.0. I'll gladly change my review to 5 Stars if/when the AW experience is improved.

author: Stephen Martin
comment: Great app but why is the delete activity button (immediately after stopping an activity) on the left when every other app has it on the right, on the smart watch app? I've deleted my last two runs by mistake because of this. Other than that i love it!

author: Matthew Wheeler
comment: Desperately needs Tizen support. The Gear S2 and S3 are the most popular smartwatches for Android devices yet this app only supports Android Wear and the Sony SmartWatch 2 (which no one has).

author: Lexi Slavin
comment: I have tried a myriad of running applications (run keeper, Google fit etc.) But none synced with strava smoothly got glitches, not sinking when I thought it had etc. I always have my phone cycling  but I like to rub phone free and never found an application I liked that I could use without my phone.  I love ghost racer on my smartwatch 3, simple, clean and works.

author: Vaclav Novak
comment: this is the best running app for my moto 360 sport. This is the only app which allows me to select 3 zones per my choice and synchs to Strava instantly with HR and everything. 5 stars . fast GPS, fast responses just fantastic. I can only wish for capability to undjusting location of those 3 zones, push it little up right left ... moto 360 sport is not fully rounded on the bottom so it would be good to be able use effectively available spacw
Can you please make the ghost track colors configurable? Then it would be perfect, lime green is frequently hard to make out against the map if you're using them for pathfinding.

author: James Alabaster
comment: I've got a new Sony SW3 and I can't get past the screen overlay settings on watch even though my settings on Galaxy Samsung S7 has allowed all storage and location.
It makes what I needed,  save .gpx files on my Sony SmartWatch 3 to see it later on PC and that without conversion.  Great app!

author: Job van Donselaar
comment: If the starting elevation was correct i would give it 5stars.not a big problem because uploading to strava will get me the correct readings. I always have an elevation gain of 60m after 1m ride. After that it goes correct.
